# depthStencilAttachmentTextureUsage

**Instance Property**

The texture usage characteristics that the view uses when creating the depth and stencil textures.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var depthStencilAttachmentTextureUsage: MTLTextureUsage { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Metal/MTLTextureUsage/renderTarget].

## Configuring the Render Target Properties

- **depthStencilPixelFormat**: The format used to generate the [doc://com.apple.metalkit/documentation/MetalKit/MTKView/depthStencilTexture] object.
- **clearDepth**: The depth value to use to clear the depth target when creating a render pass descriptor.
- **clearStencil**: The stencil value to use to clear the stencil target when creating a render pass descriptor.
